info.name: LukaWolf's Black and SkyBlue Chatzy
info.description: A dark skin for Chatzy, which uses black and deepskyblue colors accompanied by some lighter shades where necessary. I will update this if there is enough demand or if I continue to use their service.
info.additionalInfo:
VERSION 0.1:
